column1: '''Paul Raymond Gregory''' ([[1949]]) is an artist who has created [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-inspired illustrations. He produced the artwork for [[Blind Guardian
column2: Blind Guardian's]] ''A Night at the Opera''.

column1: *''[[Paul Raymond Gregory: From the World of Tolkien]]'' (exhibition catalogue)
